english.segment1: It feels like your life's crashing down all around you. Let me ask if it's really so bad. Look at the world in it's suffering. Can you honestly tell me that know one else could understand. All the hurting inside
english.segment2: Why can't you see that freedom is sometimes simply another perspective away. Who could you be if your lens was changed for a moment, Would you still be the same
english.segment3: A young child looks through a great stained glass window. Watching the people go by. Everyone seems to be wearing a red coat. His mother sees jackets in white. Now he can't understand why does she see it this way
english.segment4: Why can't you see that freedom is sometimes simply another perspective away. Who could you be if your lens was changed for a moment, Would you still be the same
english.segment5: Yesterday, you really couldn't see. By changing your angle a new world would be. Revealed to your once blinded eyes by moving a few degrees
